notifications-messageheader.name: NotificationsMessageHeader
notifications-messageheader.publisher: HL7 International - Infrastructure and Messaging Work Group
notifications-messageheader.description: The Da Vinci Notifications MessageHeader Profile sets minimum expectations for the FHIR [MessageHeader] resource to record the necessary context for Da Vinci notification messaging using FHIR resources.  It references the focus of the use case event or request as well as other information related to the action typically transmitted in a [Bundle] resource in which the MessageHeader resource instance is the first resource in the Bundle.

admit-notification-messageheader.name: AdmitNotificationMessageHeader
admit-notification-messageheader.publisher: HL7 International - Infrastructure and Messaging Work Group
admit-notification-messageheader.description: The Da Vinci Admit Notification MessageHeader Profile builds on  the [Da Vinci Notifications MessageHeader Profile] and sets minimum expectations for the FHIR [MessageHeader] resource to record the necessary context for Da Vinci admit notification messaging scenario.  The event code is "notification-admit" and the focus of the event is the [US Core Encounter Profile].

admit-discharge-notification-coverage.name: AdmitDischargeNotificationCoverageProfile
admit-discharge-notification-coverage.publisher: HL7 International - Infrastructure and Messaging Work Group
admit-discharge-notification-coverage.description: The Da Vinci Admit Notification Coverage Profile is based on the [HRex Coverage Profile] and constrains the Patient resource referenced by the `Coverage.beneficiary` element to be found in the same message Bundle.

discharge-notification-messageheader.name: DischargeNotificationMessageHeader
discharge-notification-messageheader.publisher: HL7 International - Infrastructure and Messaging Work Group
discharge-notification-messageheader.description: The Da Vinci Discharge Notification MessageHeader Profile  builds on  the [Da Vinci Notifications MessageHeader Profile] and sets  minimum expectations for the FHIR [MessageHeader] resource to record the necessary context for Da Vinci discharge notification messaging scenario.  The event code is "notification-discharge" and the focus of the event is the [US Core Encounter Profile].

admit-discharge-notification-encounter.name: AdmitDischargeNotificationEncounterProfile
admit-discharge-notification-encounter.publisher: HL7 International - Infrastructure and Messaging Work Group
admit-discharge-notification-encounter.description: The Da Vinci Admit Notification Encounter Profile is based on the [US Core Encounter Profile] and and constrains the resources referenced by the `Encounter.Subject`,`Encounter.Location`, and `Encounter.participant.individual`  to be found in the same message Bundle.  In addition, the Location reference is constrained to the [US Core Location Profile]

admit-discharge-notification-condition.name: AdmitDischargeNotificationConditionProfile
admit-discharge-notification-condition.publisher: HL7 International - Infrastructure and Messaging Work Group
admit-discharge-notification-condition.description: The Da Vinci Admit Notification Condition Profile is based on the [US Core Condition Profile] and adds the mandatory `Condition.encounter` element which references the [US Core Encounter Profile] in the same message Bundle.

notifications-bundle.name: NotificationsBundle
notifications-bundle.publisher: HL7 International - Infrastructure and Messaging Work Group
notifications-bundle.description: The Da Vinci Notifications Bundle Profile constrains the FHIR [Bundle] resource to the Da Vinci notification messaging framework.
